com.linecorp.armeria.client.http

Class SimpleHttpRequestBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.linecorp.armeria.client.http.SimpleHttpRequestBuilder
  • Deprecated. 
    Use HttpRequest or AggregatedHttpMessage instead.

    @Deprecated
public class SimpleHttpRequestBuilder
extends Object
    Creates a new SimpleHttpRequest.
